sqlMap.statement: SELECT TC.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK ,TC.PRC_RULE_ATTRB_CD ,TC.PRC_RULE_COND_FROM_TXT ,TC.PRC_RULE_COND_THRU_TXT ,TC.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM ,TC.EFF_FROM_DT ,TC.EFF_THRU_DT FROM PRC_RULE_TRX_COND TC WHERE TC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TC.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #ruleId# AND TC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY TC.PRC_RULE_ATTRB_CD ,TC.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM

SELECT D.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK ,D.PRC_RULE_COND_GRP_PK FROM PRC_RULE_DTL D WHERE D.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND D.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #ruleId# AND D.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = #groupPk# AND D.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT HD.PRC_RULE_NM ,HD.EZUPTIME ,HD.EZUPTIMEZONE FROM PRC_RULE_HDR HD WHERE HD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND HD.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #ruleId#

SELECT H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK ,H.PRC_RULE_COND_GRP_CD ,H.PRC_RULE_OP_TP_CD ,D1.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_01 ,D1.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_01 ,D1.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_01 ,D2.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_02 ,D2.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_02 ,D2.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_02 ,D3.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_03 ,D3.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_03 ,D3.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_03 ,D4.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_04 ,D4.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_04 ,D4.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_04 ,D5.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_05 ,D5.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_05 ,D5.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_05 ,D6.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_06 ,D6.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_06 ,D6.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_06 ,D7.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_07 ,D7.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_07 ,D7.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_07 ,D8.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_08 ,D8.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_08 ,D8.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_08 ,D9.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_09 ,D9.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_09 ,D9.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_09 ,D10.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_10 ,D10.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_10 ,D10.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_10 ,D11.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_11 ,D11.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_11 ,D11.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_11 ,D12.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK AS PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_PK_12 ,D12.PRC_RULE_COND_NUM AS PRC_RULE_COND_NUM_12 ,D12.PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK AS PRC_RULE_TRX_COND_PK_12 ,H.EFF_FROM_DT ,H.EFF_THRU_DT ,H.EZUPTIME ,H.EZUPTIMEZONE ,H.EZINTIME AS XX_REC_HIST_CRAT_TS ,H.EZINUSERID AS XX_REC_HIST_CRAT_BY_NM ,H.EZUPTIME AS XX_REC_HIST_UPD_TS ,H.EZUPUSERID AS XX_REC_HIST_UPD_BY_NM ,H.EZTABLEID AS XX_REC_HIST_TBL_NM FROM PRC_RULE_COND_HDR H ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D1 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D2 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D3 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D4 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D5 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D6 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D7 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D8 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D9 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D10 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D11 ,PRC_RULE_COND_DTL D12 WHERE H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND H.PRC_RULE_HDR_PK = #ruleId# AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D1.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D1.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D1.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D1.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 1 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D2.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D2.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D2.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D2.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 2 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D3.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D3.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D3.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D3.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 3 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D4.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D4.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D4.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D4.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 4 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D5.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D5.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D5.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D5.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 5 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D6.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D6.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D6.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D6.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 6 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D7.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D7.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D7.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D7.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 7 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D8.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D8.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D8.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D8.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 8 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D9.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D9.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D9.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D9.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 9 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D10.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D10.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D10.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D10.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 10 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D11.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D11.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D11.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D11.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 11 AND H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D12.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = D12.EZCANCELFLAG(+) AND H.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK = D12.PRC_RULE_COND_HDR_PK(+) AND D12.PRC_RULE_COND_DTL_NUM(+) = 12 ORDER BY LENGTH(H.PRC_RULE_COND_GRP_CD) ASC ,H.PRC_RULE_COND_GRP_CDã€€ASC
